channel.title: How do you edit stuff in dodian?

item.title: How do you edit stuff in dodian?
item.dc:creator: @Rmds90 Rmds90
item.description:
@Rmds90 wrote:

i see, but theres already a version out that doesn’t need mysql. I guess your right… i have seen many people hosting “dodian” servers but i dont think they actually code anything on them. i managed to do several things on my server that other servers dont have… like enable pking and making the pk points change or editing runes for spells.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you edit stuff in dodian?

item.title: How do you edit stuff in dodian?
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

[quote=“Rmds90, post:3, topic:151966”]i know how to code on servers like testscape…i wanted to try something else so im trying to code dodian. If anyone knows anything about the thing i posted pls reply =D[/quote]Heres the thing, Dodian is one of the more advanced servers with MySql and stuff, untill more people use them as sources not many people will know much.

item.title: How do you edit stuff in dodian?
item.dc:creator: @Rmds90 Rmds90
item.description:
@Rmds90 wrote:

Im using the dodian server, every time i want to add a teleport to a ladder it never works.

            } else if (objectID == 1764) {
                stairs = 12;
                skillX = objectX;
                skillY = objectY;
                stairDistance = 1;

This is an example of stairs on dodian, could anyone explain what everything above is?

Read full topic
